item.title: ‘When the Light Breaks,’ ‘Dreams’ Nominated for Nordic Council Film Prize – and ‘The Last Paradise on Earth,’ the First-Ever Entry From the Faroe Islands
item.description: Seven Nordic features have been nominated for the 2025 Nordic Council Film Prize. “For the first time in its two-decade history, the Nordic Council Film Prize shortlist has been expanded to seve
